attributes.action: Build large music venue on the Isle of Wight
attributes.additional_details:
We need the government to give the Isle of Wight council extra funding to build/create a new large music venue, such as a Live Nation venue or O2 Academy. Refurbishing the old Ryde Theatre would be IDEAL!

The benefits of having a larger gig venue:
- More entertainment/bigger artists ALL YEAR ROUND
- More tourism
- Better facilities for local community and schools/colleges
- Improved music scene
- Improved economy
- Creates new business
- More employment opportunities

Either need access to good facilities and services on the island OR to give islanders better access to these facilities provided elsewhere (improved ferry costs/timings or build a bridge).
